sentence.Network_en: He has received extensive corrective surgery to his skull.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的头骨做过大面积的矫形手术。

sentence.Network_en: Scientific institutions have been reluctant to take corrective action.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学机构一直不愿作出更正。

sentence.Network_en: We need to take corrective action to halt this country's decline.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们得采取纠偏行动来阻止这个国家的衰落。

corrective repeater 校正帮电机corrective 矫味药corrector 校正器
Acts to assure quality and provide corrective and preventive actions when required., 确保质量 , 在需要的时候提供纠正性和预防性措施.

list.abs: 词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Corrective 正确的 Correct 改正，纠正 Selfish 自私的.
宁静致远 - 泉 - 网易博客 ... B－Bias( 偏误) C－Correct( 正确) A－Application( 应用).
网球英文术语_百度文库 ... continental 大陆式 correction 更正 court surfaces 场地表面.
...不太容易能有效撷取物体在阴影与光线下的分界；Pertsel解释，这就是数字侦测(detection)与校正(correction)技术的关键所在。
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... accompany vt. 伴随，陪同；为…伴奏 correctness n. 正确，正确性 budget n. 预算.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French correctif, -ive or late Latin correctivus, from Latin correct- 'brought into order' from the verb corrigere (see correct)

entry.def: Corrective measures or techniques are intended to put right something that is wrong.

example.ex: Scientific institutions have been reluctant to take corrective action...
example.tran: 科学机构一直不愿作出更正。

example.ex: He has received extensive corrective surgery to his skull.
example.tran: 他的头骨做过大面积的矫形手术。

entry.tran: 起纠正作用的东西;修正
entry.def: If something is a corrective to a particular view or account, it gives a more accurate or fairer picture than there would have been without it.

example.ex: ...a useful corrective to the mistaken view that all psychologists are behaviourists.
example.tran: 对所有的心理学者都是行为主义者这一错误观点的有效纠正

means.word_mean: 1. a device for treating injury or disease

sentences.sentence: "the teacher's action was corrective rather than instructional"

means.word_mean: 2. tending or intended to correct or counteract or restore to a normal condition;

auth_sentence.content: The criticism of memory as a corrective to first impressions.
auth_sentence.res_content: The criticism of memory as a corrective to first impressions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The criticism of memory as a corrective to first impressions.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Barroso said corrective measures in Greece are now on track.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Barroso said corrective measures in Greece are now on track.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Barroso said corrective measures in Greece are now on track.

auth_sentence.content: We shall have to look into and take the corrective measures.
auth_sentence.res_content: We shall have to look into and take the corrective measures.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We shall have to look into and take the corrective measures.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+direct直接的→adj.间接的, 迂回的
di离开+rect正,直→直接离开→径直的→指向，针对→管理，指导
direct直接的+ly表副词→adv.直接地, 立即
correct[v.改正,纠正]+itude状态→纠正后的状态
correct[v.改正,纠正]+ive表名词→n.矫正物, 中和物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 方向, 指导, 趋势
stems_affixes.word_buile: direct直接的;指导;指向+ion动作或状态→n.方向, 指导, 趋势

stems_affixes.value_cn: 主任, 主管, 导演
stems_affixes.word_buile: direct直接的+or人或物器→n.主任, 主管, 导演
rect正,直+angle角→[四个角]都是直角→矩形
rect正,直+itude状态→正直的状态→诚实,正直
di离开+rect正,直→直接离开→径直的→指向，针对→管理，指导
rect正,直+ify……化→使……正直→改正[错误]

sentences.en: It is possible to do corrective surgery on the eyes to take care of the problem.
sentences.cn: 通过做眼睛矫正手术解决这个问题是可行的。
